attributes.action: abolish or atleast reduce all charges for resits in exams
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My petition is about this subject because these are charges that are way over the amount that should be paid. For example to resit a AQA as level will cost £12.10 for what a bit of paper with questions on. Its a stealth tax that does now need to be there.
